alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Martin; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 8:20PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Washington, northern Hyde, west central Dare, southeastern Martin, northeastern Beaufort and southern Tyrrell Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Gum Neck to near Terra Ceia. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington, Belhaven, Killkenny, Manns Harbor, Ponzer, Scranton, Pinetown, Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Fairfield, Pungo, Wenona, Hinson, Bunyan, Pike Road, Leechville, Terra Ceia, Yeatesville, Fort Landing and Frying Pan Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Martin; Tyrrell; Washington
